FlowGraph
Table of Contents

Class Node

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

Represents a node in the flow graph. Uses a Definition (immutable) + State (mutable) composition pattern. Implements ICanvasElement for unified element handling.

public class Node : ICanvasElement, INotifyPropertyChanged
Inheritance
object
Node
Implements
ICanvasElement
INotifyPropertyChanged

LoggingExtensions.LogNodeCreated(Node, string)
LoggingExtensions.LogNodeMoved(Node, double, double, string)

Remarks

The node's structural properties (Id, Type, Label, Ports, capability flags) are stored in the Definition record. Runtime state (position, size, selection) is stored in the State object.

For backward compatibility, pass-through properties are provided that delegate to either Definition or State as appropriate.

Constructors

Node()

Creates a node with default definition. For backward compatibility.

public Node()

Node(NodeDefinition, INodeState?)

Creates a node with the specified definition and optional state.

public Node(NodeDefinition definition, INodeState? state = null)

Parameters

definition NodeDefinition

The immutable node definition.

state INodeState

The mutable node state. If null, a new NodeState is created.

Custom user data associated with the node.

public object? Data { get; set; }

Property Value

object

Definition

The immutable definition of this node (identity, type, ports, capabilities). Use with expressions to modify: node.Definition = node.Definition with { Label = "x" };

public NodeDefinition Definition { get; set; }

Property Value

NodeDefinition

Height

The height of the node. Null means auto-sized.

public double? Height { get; set; }

Id

Unique identifier for the node. Immutable - to change, replace the Definition.

public string Id { get; }

Property Value

string

Inputs

Input ports for this node. For full immutability, use Definition.Inputs directly.

public List<Port> Inputs { get; set; }

Property Value

List<Port>

Whether the group is collapsed (only applicable when IsGroup is true).

public bool IsCollapsed { get; set; }

IsConnectable

Whether this node can have new connections. Default is true.

public bool IsConnectable { get; set; }

bool

Whether this node can be deleted. Default is true.
